column4: I actually am surprised that I can't find the wizard for configuring xorg.conf -- I am wondering if I *really* have to make up my own xorg.conf if I want to configure it... o.o
one more info: he made an fresh installation with the 9.10 livecd. in the livecd, the X worked. in the installation in the hd, it didn't
in command line you can use Xorg -configure ..
